backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the requirement to remove all three memory cards from MemoriesSection and optionally remove the section from App.tsx entirely.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source files to short human-readable summaries describing each component's purpose and current state.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, and chart tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell with a root div and a module script tag loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component that renders Hero, ForgivenessPage, LetterSection, and Footer in sequence with MemoriesSection removed.
frontend/src/components/FadeIn.tsx: Scroll-triggered fade-in wrapper using IntersectionObserver that transitions children from invisible/offset to visible with a configurable delay.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Romantic footer displaying a decorative heart image, a closing love message in script font, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
Interactive section asking 'Did you forgive me?' where the No button continuously orbits the Yes button via CSS animation, and clicking Yes reveals a forgiveness message.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-viewport hero section with an animated petal background, large 'I'm Sorry' serif heading, and a scroll-down button.
frontend/src/components/LetterSection.ts: Handwritten-style sorry letter rendered on a letter-paper background image with script salutation and serif body paragraphs expressing remorse and love.
Empty file â€” the MemoriesSection component has been cleared of all content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind base/component/utility layers, CSS custom properties for a warm romantic color theme (light/dark), custom fonts (Playfair Display, Dancing Script, Lora), and keyframe animations like petal-fall and no-orbit.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, oklch-based color tokens (rose, cream, blush, sidebar, chart), border radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's current state (version 15), summarizing it as a personal 'sorry' website with a sorry letter, interactive forgiveness page with Yes/No buttons, and a special 'I love you' reveal card, along with a list of implemented features.
